description: Developed a PWA to securely store and access medical records of patients on an Ethereum Blockchain.
Developed a responsive UI with form validation, custom modal, and PDF upload on IPFS using Web3.storage.
Implemented transaction of data between Solidity smart contracts and clients using Web3.js.
Developed a Basic Banking System full-stack web application using HTML, CSS, PHP, and MySQL.
Integrated a payment gateway and stored transaction record for users.

projects.title: Medikeeper
description: Developed a PWA to securely store and access medical records of patients on an Ethereum Blockchain.
Developed a responsive UI with form validation, custom modal, and PDF upload on IPFS using Web3.storage.
Implemented transaction of data between Solidity smart contracts and clients using Web3.js.

projects.title: Face Recognition Attendance System
description: Developed an app for automated attendance by recognizing faces from firebase storage with 85% accuracy.
Ensured accuracy by reading data of multiple facial expressions to make face data for database and recognition.
Implemented face recognition using FaceApi.js library built on top of Tensorflow.js

projects.title: MERNChat
description: Developed a RTC real-time communication app using web sockets (socket.io).
Developed a REST API using Express server for authentication and JWT authorization.
Stored the user information and messages in Mongo DB atlas.

projects.title: YouTube Clone
description: Developed a UI clone of YouTube using React, Next, and Tailwind.
Integrated YouTube API using Context API and reducer functions for state management and playback.
